Articles.Content:
So i started uploading the next episode of "the kerbal show"

But it just stops at 98%. and doesn't move...

What do i do to make it upload?

Also, i've been waiting for about half an hour for it to finish

Is it processing? That takes a long time and it's buggy.

EDIT: I feel sorry for you by the way.

Yeah.. it was processing FOREVER...

Took almost 2 hours.. but i got it done
Dang man, was it a long video, or was it a crappy computer problem?

It was 6 minutes. the internet where i live isn't that good...
And even after the upload finally finished, the forums went down for an hour...
